appendix.title: Ring Buffer Max Value Script
appendix.para: This script is intended to be run on a single host at a time. It will set all interfaces on the host to the maximum ring buffer values. It may be used with some sort of orchestration, for example &salt;, to apply to all hosts in a cluster.
appendix.screen: for i in `ls /etc/sysconfig/network/ifcfg-*`;do nicname=`echo $i|cut -f2 -d"-"` echo nicname=$nicname if [ `ethtool -g $nicname 2>/dev/null |wc -l ` -gt 6 ]; then ethtoolcmd="-G $nicname rx `ethtool -g $nicname|head -6|grep RX:|cut -f2 -d":"|xargs` tx `ethtool -g $nicname|head -6|grep TX:|cut -f2 -d":"|xargs`" echo ethtoolcmd=$ethtoolcmd sed -i "s/ETHTOOL_OPTIONS=''/ETHTOOL_OPTIONS='$ethtoolcmd'/g" $i fi done
